title: Reporting Botting players in Co-op vs AI games
body: As anyone who's played a bot game will know, botting players are getting more and more prevalent. Does reporting these players while in bot games actually do anything? Or is reporting players only for PvP?

replies.body:
Yep, please continue to report these accounts under "Cheating" so they can be banned.

Make sure you're confident they're not just a really inexperienced player though.

Hey SephirothSG,

You do some damn great work on the Boards! Stop by and say "hi!" in the Community Chat!

http://www.wrenchmen.org/invite

Thanks!
